After tornadoes hit these two towns earlier this week, GPC is responding by sending a tractor-trailer load of essential relief supplies to Onalaska and Columbia. TBM volunteers offered help, hope and healing to Onalaska, a town of 2,800 in southern East Texas, after an EF-3 tornado destroyed 46 homes and damaged another 291. Yesterday the Pearland Police Department received a mutual aid request from Polk County Chief Deputy Byron Lyons for UAS support to map the damaged areas due to the F3 Tornado that traveled through Onalaska, Texas. URGENT HELP NEEDED TOMORROW!!!

Our team is providing relief to families devastated by the deadly tornado that struck Onalaska, Texas, killing 3 people and damaging nearly 300 homes.
